'''LEGO Minecraft: Steve's Netherite Adventure''' is a sticker book set in [[LEGO Minecraft|''LEGO Minecraft'']].

== Summary ==
{{Quote|Search for [[sword]]s, [[armor]], [[ingot]]s and a whole lot more in this packed LEGO® Minecraft® search and find sticker activity book.

Build your [[Steve]] minifigure and arm him with his sword before joining him on a dangerous quest for a [[netherite sword]]. Explore [[the Overworld]], [[the Nether]], [[the End]] and other cool LEGO Minecraft scenes as you journey through the book.

Search through the packed scenes, complete the fun puzzles and use the stickers provided to help Steve on his mission!}}
